property.name: Move existing fighters to new carriers
notes
property.value: Cold War Scenario October 1962: Cuban Missle Crisis Instead of following demands by the U.S. to remove missles in Cuba, Cuba is alligned with the United Soviet Socialist Republics(USSR) to not follow those orders, which then leads to war between the North Atlantic Trade Organisation(NATO) members and the Warsaw-Pact members including Cuba. Alliances: =Warsaw-Pact: U.S.S.R. and Satellite States(Poland, East Germany, Czechoslovakia, Hungary Bulgaria) =N.A.T.O.: Americans, North Atlantic Forces(NAF: Canada, UK, Portugal, Iceland), Western Front Forces(WFF: West Germany, Netherlands, Belgium, Denmark, Norway), France, Italy, and Eastern Front Forces(EFF:Greece and Turkey) Capitals: USSR=Moscow Satellites=Warsaw US=Washington D.C. NAF=London WFF=Amsterdam France=Paris Italy=Rome EFF=Istanbul Created by ????. Converted up to TripleA 1.2.5.3 by Veqryn
